Aldeburgh Library

Manager: Sue Osben

Victoria Road, Aldeburgh
IP15 5EG

  • Tel: 01728 452502
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Aldeburgh Library Foundation
  • Facebook
  • Twitter

Branch updates

Aldeburgh Library will be closed for refurbishment from 24 - 30 June, reopening on Monday 1 July.

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday 0900 – 1300
Tuesday 0900 – 1300
Wednesday 0900 – 1300, 1500 – 1800
Thursday 0900 – 1300
Friday 0900 – 1300
Saturday 1000 – 1230, 1300 – 1530
Sunday 1000 – 1230, 1300 – 1530

Room & venue hire

Room and space hire at Aldeburgh Library →

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: free parking available nearby
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Customer toilet
  • Display space: Two cork boards in the foyer.
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in
  • For sale: Greetings cards for various occasions
  • Also available:
    • Laminating - A3 and A4
    • Memories Corner - memorabilia and books to encourage reminiscence and conversation and reference books for dementia carers.

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • 3D printing: available by prior arrangement
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Baby Bounce and Tot Rock

Monday, 1030-1100

Songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers.

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Lego club: for ages 5+

Sunday, 1100-1200

Follow the weekly theme or build what you like. Under-8s must be accompanied by an adult.

Reading groups

Britten reading group

first Sunday of the month, 1430-1530

WI reading group

first Tuesday of the month, 1000-1100

IT help

IT help

Every day, opening hours

IT support is available during opening hours. Ask a member of staff for assistance.

Health & wellbeing events

Friendship Fridays health and wellbeing drop-in café: all welcome

Friday, 1030-1200

Short talks, information sessions and activities with tea, coffee and biscuits. Come along for the whole session or just pop in. Run in collaboration with parish nurse Ali Cherry.

Upcoming special events

No upcoming special events.
